articles.title: Maharashtra Speaker Election Live Updates: Rahul Narvekar Elected As Assembly Speaker
articles.description: BJP MLA Rahul Narvekar was today elected as the Maharashtra Assembly Speaker.
articles.content:
Deputy Speaker Narhari Zirwal was officiating as the acting Speaker
Mumbai: BJP MLA Rahul Narvekar was today elected as the Maharashtra Assembly Speaker.

articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: Congress demands BJP apology for sharing misleading news report on Rahul Gandhi
articles.description: A letter from Congress leader Jairam Ramesh to BJP chief J P Nadda refers to a Zee News report aired on July 1, which falsely linked Gandhi's comments on the attack at his Wayanad office with the murder of Kanhaiya Lal in Udaipur.
articles.content: The Congress party has demanded an apology from Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leaders for sharing an edited video of Rahul Gandhi played by a television channel, Zee News, which falsely suggested that… [+2857 chars]

articles.title: Amravati murder: Accused worked for victim; both part of same WhatsApp group | What we know so far
articles.description: Chemist Umesh Prahladrao Kolhe was stabbed to death in Amravati on June 21. Seven people, including prime accused Irfan Khan, have been arrested in the case.
articles.content: Amravati chemist Umesh Prahladrao Kolhe was stabbed to death on June 21 for allegedly sharing a post on some WhatsApp groups in support of Nupur Sharma for her comments against Prophet Muhammad. The … [+2141 chars]
